title: 关于ppdiffusers/examples/dreambooth中的代码更新申请
body:
## Feature request

### 希望官方的训练代码可以更新对hf_hub、diffusers模型的支持。

按照目前训练代码（ https://github.com/PaddlePaddle/PaddleNLP/tree/develop/ppdiffusers/examples/dreambooth ）中README的信息， “--pretrained_model_name_or_path: 所使用的 Stable Diffusion 模型权重名称或者本地下载的模型路径，目前支持了上表中的8种模型权重，我们可直接替换使用。”

然而实际替换成hf_hub的模型名称，是没有办法直接替换使用的。训练脚本没有提供传入from_hf_hub、from_diffusers和to_diffusers三个参数，因此目前的脚本实际上无法读取、下载、训练、保存比较主流的pytorch模型。

### 关于此目前我做的工作

#### 半成品脚本
我做了一个更新的版本，增加了to_diffusers（保存成pytorch diffusers）、from_diffusers（读取hf_diffusers模型）和from_hf_hub（从huggingface下载模型）三个参数以传入，action为store_true，调用即激活。

#### from_hf_hub遇到的问题
然而，训练中的AutoTokenizer类即使调用了subfolder=“tokenizer”似乎也不能正确定位vocab.json文件。

我尝试使用hf_hub_download直接下载，在AI Studio中HTTP报错443（链接正确，本地可以打开）。

因此我放弃了from_hf_hub，只测试了在work目录下放diffusers模型的情况。

#### 目前进度
使用本地模型时，在AI Studio中可以成功读取并训练基于pytorch anything-v5的LoRA模型。

以下是链接：

https://github.com/A-cunminF/ppdiffusers_train_dreambooth_and_lora/tree/main

希望官方能够尽快跟进训练脚本的更新！

title: [XPU] update loss, dropout, triangle for xpu
body:
### PR types
New features

### PR changes
Others

### Description
根据XPU的特性，修改部分细节：
* loss：XPU能支持`parallel_loss_func`，可以直接调用。
* use_fused_dropout_add：XPU目前没有这个算子的实现，需要在提交作业的时候使用`-o Model.use_fused_dropout_add=False`的方法来关掉它。因此加了一个参数，使得可以喂给`TransformerDecoderLayer`。
* triangle：XPU目前不支持`incubate.softmax_mask_fuse_upper_triangle`，会调用`get_triangle_upper_mask`函数。但是`full_like`在XPU下面不支持`-np.inf`，所以先放了一个`-1e4`。等以后XPU能直接支持`incubate.softmax_mask_fuse_upper_triangle`之后就可以不用它了。

title: 有多张 GPU，但是每张 GPU 的显存大小都不足以容纳完整的模型,怎么将模型部署到多张 GPU 上进行推理
body:
### 请提出你的问题

ChatGLM 提供了这种方法
首先安装 accelerate: pip install accelerate，然后通过如下方法加载模型：
from utils import load_model_on_gpus
model = load_model_on_gpus("THUDM/chatglm-6b", num_gpus=2)
即可将模型部署到两张 GPU 上进行推理。你可以将 num_gpus 改为你希望使用的 GPU 数。默认是均匀切分的，你也可以传入 device_map 参数来自己指定。

---------------------------------------------------------------------------

现在paddle有没有这种功能？

title: [Question]:  uie抽关系或者实体的时候能设置自动过滤么？比如probability低于0.5就不作为结果这样的？还是说全部抽出来后再另外处理？
body:
### 请提出你的问题

uie抽关系或者实体的时候能设置自动过滤么？比如probability低于0.5就不作为结果这样的？还是说全部抽出来后再另外处理？

我之前在百度的答疑群里看到有人回复说;
Taskflow里面通过probability已经过滤了一波，你可以设置自己的需求设置probability，例如你要求准确率高就设置大一点；

然后我就在加了这个参数，如下：

`ent_re_extract = Taskflow("information_extraction", schema=ent_relation_schema,
                                           task_path='checkpoint/ent_relation/checkpoint-8000',
                                           max_seq_len=512, batch_size=1, probability=0.5)`

但是依然会将低于0.5的结果输出出来，版本信息：

Version: 2.5.0
Windows 11系统


请问正确的设置方式是什么呢，谢谢解答

title: [Question]: Optimize english model
body:
### 请提出你的问题

Hello.Thanks for your beautiful product and effort on making it publicly available. 
I just finetuned uie-base-en model , to extract PII information in my data. 
Currently I'm trying to find the way to simplify model and make it works faster. 
I've tried the way like data_distill , and it works fine, however output model lost ability to work with promts. Which was working on uie-base-en without training. 

I'm looking for a way to user smaller model such as uie-tiny, but there are not pre-trained model for English. 
Would you suggest the steps to optimize the inference time. 
Currently I'm processing page of text and average inference time is around 1 sec per page. My goal is to reduce it up to 0.3 sec per page.  Any help would be appreciated.

title: [Question]: ChatGLM  finetune-lora 过程中，发现显存使用量 一直在逐步增加
body:
### 请提出你的问题

finetune.sh

python -m paddle.distributed.launch --gpus "0,2" finetune_generation.py \
    --model_name_or_path THUDM/chatglm-6b \
    --task_path ../assistant/gen_dialogues/train \
    --max_steps 50000 \
    --learning_rate 3e-5 \
    --warmup_steps 20 \
    --eval_steps 1000 \
    --logging_steps 500 \
    --save_steps 1000 \
    --save_total_limit 100 \
    --output_dir ./checkpoints/chatglm-6b \
    --src_length 2048 \
    --tgt_length 50 \
    --per_device_eval_batch_size 4 \
    --per_device_train_batch_size 4 \
    --gradient_accumulation_steps 4 \
    --fp16 \
    --fp16_opt_level O2 \
    --recompute True \
    --do_train \
    --tensor_parallel_degree 2 \
    --lora True

上面是配置，在微调过程中 显存占用逐步在增加，训练半个小时的时间内 由17G 涨到了24G，直至Out of memory error。

paddlenlp 用的是最新的dev分支

title: Add stable diffusion hire.fix pipeline
body:
### PR types New features ### PR changes Models ### Description **generate images with hires.fix function.** ```python import paddle from stable_diffusion_hires_fix import StableDiffusionHiresFixPipeline from ppdiffusers import EulerAncestralDiscreteScheduler pipe = StableDiffusionHiresFixPipeline.from_pretrained("stabilityai/stable-diffusion-2", paddle_dtype=paddle.float16) pipe.scheduler = EulerAncestralDiscreteScheduler.from_config(pipe.scheduler.config) generator = paddle.Generator().manual_seed(5232132133) prompt = "1 real girl, long black hair, detailed face, light smile, chinese style, hanfu" image = pipe(prompt, guidance_scale=7.5, height=768, width=768, generator=generator, num_inference_steps=40, hires_ratio=0.5, hr_resize_width=768, hr_resize_height=1024, enable_hr=True).images[0] image.show() ```
**Note** The image generated by ppdiffusers has a little difference from webui's due to the difference of generated sigmas. Here show a picture from webui below.

title: [New features] add multi stop tokens features
body:
<!-- Demo: https://github.com/PaddlePaddle/PaddleNLP/pull/26 -->
### PR types
<!-- One of [ New features | Bug fixes | Function optimization | Performance optimization | Breaking changes | Others ] -->
New features

### PR changes
<!-- One of [ Models | APIs | Docs | Others ] -->
APIs

### Description
<!-- Describe what this PR does -->
添加多个stop token 来阻止生成过程

本地测试代码如下所示：

```python
import paddle
from paddlenlp.transformers import AutoTokenizer, AutoModelForCausalLM, PretrainedTokenizer

tokenizer: PretrainedTokenizer = AutoTokenizer.from_pretrained("gpt-cpm-small-cn-distill")

input_ids = tokenizer("中国的首都是")["input_ids"]
input_ids = paddle.to_tensor([input_ids])
model = AutoModelForCausalLM.from_pretrained("gpt-cpm-small-cn-distill")

output = model.generate(input_ids, decoding_strategy="greedy_search", top_k=1, eos_token_id=[520, 15])[0].tolist()
for ids in output:
    tokens = tokenizer.convert_ids_to_tokens(output)
    print(tokenizer.convert_tokens_to_string(tokens[0]))

```

title: 关于分布式训练的问题，是不是代码逻辑写错了？
body:
### 请提出你的问题

1、在glm采取parallel训练时候，会对 qkv层进行转换，从[q1, q1, k1, k2, v1, v2] => [q1, k1, v1, q2, k2, v2]，如下两层：
"transformer.layers.0.attention.query_key_value.bias": partial(fn, is_column=True, is_old_qkv=True), "transformer.layers.0.attention.query_key_value.weight": partial(fn, is_column=True, is_old_qkv=True),
对应的代码为https://github.com/PaddlePaddle/PaddleNLP/blob/develop/paddlenlp/transformers/conversion_utils.py#L334

2、在训练的时候 ，却直接进行 mixed_layer = self.query_key_value(hidden_states)，与单卡训练逻辑一样，计算的时候没有考虑之前qkv的转换。
对应的代码如下：https://github.com/PaddlePaddle/PaddleNLP/blob/develop/paddlenlp/transformers/glm/modeling.py#L128 
https://github.com/PaddlePaddle/PaddleNLP/blob/develop/paddlenlp/transformers/glm/modeling.py#L103 

请大佬帮忙回答下，这么处理没有问题吗？还是逻辑错误。

title: mBART使用时翻译不完整 Translation using mBART is not entirely done.
body:
### 问题描述


conda env:
```
paddlenlp                 2.5.2                    pypi_0    pypi
paddlepaddle-gpu          2.3.2           py37_gpu_cuda10.2_many_linux    https://mirrors.tuna.tsinghua.edu.cn/anaconda/cloud/Paddle
```


Code (almost the same as https://github.com/PaddlePaddle/PaddleNLP/blob/v2.5.2/fast_generation/samples/mbart_sample.py, except use_fast is disabled and a longer text is used.)

```python

import paddle

from paddlenlp.transformers import MBart50Tokenizer, MBartForConditionalGeneration

# model_name = "mbart-large-50-many-to-many-mmt"
model_name = "mbart-large-50-one-to-many-mmt"

tokenizer = MBart50Tokenizer.from_pretrained(model_name, src_lang="en_XX")
model = MBartForConditionalGeneration.from_pretrained(model_name)
model.eval()


def postprocess_response(seq, bos_idx, eos_idx):
    """Post-process the decoded sequence."""
    eos_pos = len(seq) - 1
    for i, idx in enumerate(seq):
        if idx == eos_idx:
            eos_pos = i
            break
    seq = [idx for idx in seq[: eos_pos + 1] if idx != bos_idx and idx != eos_idx]
    res = tokenizer.convert_ids_to_string(seq)
    return res


bos_id = tokenizer.lang_code_to_id["zh_CN"]
eos_id = model.mbart.config["eos_token_id"]

inputs = """
The MBart model was presented in Multilingual Denoising Pre-training for Neural Machine Translation by Yinhan Liu, Jiatao Gu, Naman Goyal, Xian Li, Sergey Edunov Marjan Ghazvininejad, Mike Lewis, Luke Zettlemoyer. 
According to the abstract, MBART is a sequence-to-sequence denoising auto-encoder pretrained on large-scale monolingual corpora in many languages using the BART objective. 
mBART is one of the first methods for pretraining a complete sequence-to-sequence model by denoising full texts in multiple languages, while previous approaches have focused only on the encoder, decoder, or reconstructing parts of the text.
To generate using the mBART-50 multilingual translation models, eos_token_id is used as the decoder_start_token_id and the target language id is forced as the first generated token. To force the target language id as the first generated token, pass the forced_bos_token_id parameter to the generate method. The following example shows how to translate between Hindi to French and Arabic to English using the facebook/mbart-50-large-many-to-many checkpoint.
"""

input_ids = tokenizer(inputs)["input_ids"]
input_ids = paddle.to_tensor(input_ids, dtype="int32").unsqueeze(0)

outputs, _ = model.generate(
    input_ids=input_ids,
    forced_bos_token_id=bos_id,
    # decode_strategy="sampling",
    # temperature=1.0,
    # top_k=3,
    # top_p=0.9,
    decode_strategy="beam_search",
    num_beams=4,
    # decode_strategy="greedy_search",
    max_length=5000,
    use_fast=False,
)

result = postprocess_response(outputs[0].numpy().tolist(), bos_id, eos_id)

print("Model input:", inputs)

print("Result:", result)
```

Model input: 
The MBart model was presented in Multilingual Denoising Pre-training for Neural Machine Translation by Yinhan Liu, Jiatao Gu, Naman Goyal, Xian Li, Sergey Edunov Marjan Ghazvininejad, Mike Lewis, Luke Zettlemoyer. 
According to the abstract, MBART is a sequence-to-sequence denoising auto-encoder pretrained on large-scale monolingual corpora in many languages using the BART objective. 
mBART is one of the first methods for pretraining a complete sequence-to-sequence model by denoising full texts in multiple languages, while previous approaches have focused only on the encoder, decoder, or reconstructing parts of the text.
To generate using the mBART-50 multilingual translation models, eos_token_id is used as the decoder_start_token_id and the target language id is forced as the first generated token. To force the target language id as the first generated token, pass the forced_bos_token_id parameter to the generate method. The following example shows how to translate between Hindi to French and Arabic to English using the facebook/mbart-50-large-many-to-many checkpoint.

Result: MBART模型是由Yinhan Liu、Jiatao Gu、Naman Goyal、Xian Li、Serghe Edunov、Marjan Ghazvininejad、Mike Lewis、Luke Zettlemoyer在神经机翻译的多语言预备训练中提出的。根据抽象,MBART是一个基于BART目标的大规模单语体序列序列符号化自动编码器。 MBART是通过在多个语言中标记完整的文本来预备完整的序列序列模型的第一个方法,而以前的方法只专注于编码器、解码器或文本部分的重建。

title: add flag for TIPC model hybrid_parallelism GPT
body:
<!-- Demo: https://github.com/PaddlePaddle/PaddleNLP/pull/26 -->
### PR types
<!-- One of [ New features | Bug fixes | Function optimization | Performance optimization | Breaking changes | Others ] -->
Others
### PR changes
<!-- One of [ Models | APIs | Docs | Others ] -->
Others
### Description
<!-- Describe what this PR does -->

This enable flag `FLAGS_sync_before_allreduce` in benchmark of GPT hybrid_parallelism mode. It's because we found that the performance of `GPT3-bs16-fp16-dp4-mp8-pp1` will decrease using new strategy introduced in [Paddle/PR51989](https://github.com/PaddlePaddle/Paddle/pull/51989). So we revert these changes in [Paddle/PR53089](https://github.com/PaddlePaddle/Paddle/pull/53089) and use this flag to decide which strategy will be used.

user: Tensorflow和Pytorch有哪些区别？
assistant: TensorFlow和PyTorch是两种不同的深度学习框架，它们在设计理念、运行方式、使用对象、计算速度和依赖库等方面都有所不同。

1. 运行方式：PyTorch是一种动态框架，它允许在运行过程中根据不同的数值按照最优方式进行合理安排。而TensorFlow是一种静态框架，它需要建构一个TensorFlow的计算图，然后才能将不同的数据输入进去进行运算。这种静态的运行方式带来了一些严重的问题，比如计算流程固定，效率较低。
2. 使用对象：PyTorch更适合于在短时间内建立结果和方案，更适合于计算机程序爱好者或者小规模项目，而TensorFlow更适合在大范围内进行操作，尤其是对于跨台或者是在实现嵌入式部署的时候更具优势。
3. 灵活性：PyTorch的动态计算图使得数据参数在CPU和GPU之间迁移十分灵活，调试简便。而TensorFlow的静态计算图使得数据参数在CPU和GPU之间迁移比较麻烦，调试也比较麻烦。
4. 计算速度：TensorFlow在CPU上运行速度比PyTorch快，而TensorFlow在GPU上运行速度和PyTorch相差不多。
5. 依赖库：PyTorch的依赖库相对来说比较小，而TensorFlow的依赖库则支持更多的库函数，比如图像数据预处理方式会更多。
6. 数据加载：PyTorch的API设计比较粗糙，但是加载数据的API设计很友好，加载数据的接口由一个数据集、一个取样器和一个数据加载器构成。而TensorFlow的API设计则比较庞大，使用有技巧，但有时候不能直接把数据加载进TensorFlow。
7. 设备管理：PyTorch在设备管理方面比较简单，它需要明确启用的设备。而TensorFlow则不需要手动调整设备。

综上所述，TensorFlow和PyTorch在设计理念、运行方式、使用对象、计算速度和依赖库等方面都有所不同，选择何种框架应根据具体的应用场景和需求来进行考虑。
